text: puok yeung min niyeay avei krawpi niyeay tha preah robsa puok yeung muoychamnuon ban thveu aoy anak vikalochrit laey . hou t kaban tb vinh tha pitabrakd nasa khnhom som pi a l laoh aoy chuoy thveusaeaksaei dl khnhom haey puok anak ka trauv thveusaeaksaei der tha khnhom pitchea min peakpnth nung avei del puok anak yk mk thveuchea preah
